text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Will #MikePence begin touring the meat processing facilities that are being the hardest hit by the #CoronavirusOutbreak? Some of these facilities quit testing their workers when half the employees test positive for #COVID19. @POTUS @VP @CDCgov @PressSec #TrumpIsKillingAmericans https://t.co/Yef0dXJcyn
